channel.title: CVE Feed for themebeez -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themebeez -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28687|2024-03-26T20:20:59.986Z -- themebeez -- fascinate
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in perfectwpthemes Glaze Blog Lite, themebeez Fascinate, themebeez Cream Blog, themebeez Cream Magazine allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Glaze Blog Lite: from n/a through <= 1.1.4; Fascinate: from n/a through 1.0.8; Cream Blog: from n/a through 2.1.3; Cream Magazine: from n/a through 2.1.4.
